message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to both of us. This product represents not just a financial investment but a strategic asset that can significantly impact your endeavors. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a purchase price of $750,000. I believe this offer strikes a fair balance between valuing the product appropriately while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I look forward to discussing this further with you.
